SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Engine
A singleton class that creates and handles the game.
GameFrame
The only purpose of this class is to hold a GamePanel, because a GamePanel cant create its own window, and this class cant draw anything on the screen.
GameObject
The name of this class is quite explanatory.
GamePanel
This class draws each GameObject to the screen.
GlobalKeyListener
A key listener that forwards each key event call to the listeners that can be added into this class.
Module
This class is used along with GameObject.
Updatable
An interface used for getting an action done in the game loop.
Vector2
This class is used for storing two flot values.
Vector2Int
